5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Zaid b. Arqam reported:We used to talk while engaged in prayer and a person talked with a companion on his side in prayer till (this verse) was revealed:" And stand before Allah in devout obedience" (ii, 238) and we were commanded to observe silence (in prayer) and were forbidden to speak

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْرِيمِ الْكَلاَمِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَنَسْخِ مَا كَانَ مِنْ إِبَاحَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The prohibition of speaking during the prayer, and the abrogation of its former permissibility
